title: Alligator
data:

| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | An aggressive crocodilian with great crunching jaws full of sharp teeth.***“Alligators commit errors of diet.” -Bennet Bowler, M.D., \_Contributions to the Natural History of the Alligator, (Crocodilus Mississipiensis), with a Microscopic Addendum\_, p. 17. 1846. |

- *This page is a **[stub](/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. You could probably [expand this page](http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Alligator\&action=edit) should you wish to do so.*

## Useful Info

**Alligators** are a mean step up from [crocodiles](/Crocodile "Crocodile"), capable of ambushing adventurers with surprising speed and powerful bites. They can be found in [the Swamp](/The_Swamp "The Swamp"), with a 20% chance to be accompanied by a second alligator outside of [vaults](/Vault "Vault").

## Tips & Tricks

- Their willpower is non-trivial, but a gifted [Hexer](/Hex "Hex") can overcome it. In addition, they lack any elemental resistances and are [cold-blooded](/Cold-blooded "Cold-blooded"), making [Conjurations](/Conjuration "Conjuration") reasonably effective against them. They also lack [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible"), making invisibility an appealing option against them.

## History

- In [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), alligators became faster and got a drag attack, but lost their [Sprint](/Sprint "Sprint") ability. Also, alligators' damage and maximum HP were nerfed.
- Prior to [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), alligators were able to [hide](/Submerge "Submerge") in water.
- Prior to [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), an alligator had a chance to spawn with additional [baby alligators](/Baby_alligator "Baby alligator").
- Alligators were added in [0.6-d619ec97](/0.6 "0.6").
html:
Alligator

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
alligator l 
HP 40-83
HD 12
XP 842
Speed 12 (swim: 80%)
AC 4
EV 9
Will 40
Attack1 27 (bite: drag)
Attack2 14 (tail slap: plain)


Resistances rDrown
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Amphibious
Intelligence Animal
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Natural
Size Large
Type giant lizard, alligator
Flags Cold-blooded
An aggressive crocodilian with great crunching jaws full of sharp teeth.

“Alligators commit errors of diet.”
-Bennet Bowler, M.D., _Contributions to the Natural History of the
Alligator, (Crocodilus Mississipiensis), with a Microscopic Addendum_,
p. 17. 1846.

This page is a stub. You could probably expand this page should you wish to do so.

Useful Info

Alligators are a mean step up from crocodiles, capable of ambushing adventurers with surprising speed and powerful bites. They can be found in the Swamp, with a 20% chance to be accompanied by a second alligator outside of vaults.

Tips & Tricks

  • Their willpower is non-trivial, but a gifted Hexer can overcome it. In addition, they lack any elemental resistances and are cold-blooded, making Conjurations reasonably effective against them. They also lack see invisible, making invisibility an appealing option against them.

History

  • In 0.31, alligators became faster and got a drag attack, but lost their Sprint ability. Also, alligators' damage and maximum HP were nerfed.
  • Prior to 0.18, alligators were able to hide in water.
  • Prior to 0.17, an alligator had a chance to spawn with additional baby alligators.
  • Alligators were added in 0.6-d619ec97.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Alligator&oldid=78559"

{{version031}}
{{monster info}}
{{stub}}

==Useful Info==
'''Alligators''' are a mean step up from [[crocodile]]s, capable of ambushing adventurers with surprising speed and powerful bites. They can be found in [[the Swamp]], with a 20% chance to be accompanied by a second alligator outside of [[vault]]s.

==Tips & Tricks==
*Their willpower is non-trivial, but a gifted [[Hex]]er can overcome it. In addition, they lack any elemental resistances and are [[cold-blooded]], making [[Conjuration]]s reasonably effective against them. They also lack [[see invisible]], making invisibility an appealing option against them.

==History==
*In [[0.31]], alligators became faster and got a drag attack, but lost their [[Sprint]] ability. Also, alligators' damage and maximum HP were nerfed.
*Prior to [[0.18]], alligators were able to [[submerge|hide]] in water.
*Prior to [[0.17]], an alligator had a chance to spawn with additional [[baby alligator]]s.
*Alligators were added in [[0.6|0.6-d619ec97]].
